lesson.title: Outbound Message: No Personalization, No Reply

questions.question:
How would you implement the practice "Exercise (10–15 minutes)

  Write 2 temp..." described in the lesson in your own work?
options: I follow the method described in the lesson step by step, document the results, and refine the process
I try everything at once
I only read, I don't apply
I wait for others to do it
